EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Bonuses Continues into 2018!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BlueWave Bonuses 2018 Reminder!
BlueWave depends on you to deliver solar to our customers. To demonstrate our appreciation we have created BlueWave Bonuses.
To congratulate you for becoming a new BlueWave partner (or reward you for continued deals), we offer rewards for individual sales representatives based on loans closed.
BlueWave Bonuses kicks off after your first deal with a sweet Patagonia gift for your travels!
Following this entry gift, we will be sending you cash rewards for every 5th deal you complete with BlueWave financing, up to deal number 15. We will be running this promotion for a limited time only, please read eligibility requirements below.
Eligibility & Program Details:
Promotion will be linked to email used for BlueWave portal login You must use an individual email account to be eligible, email log-ins shared within companies are not eligible for Bonus rewards. If you need support adding logins for individual reps we are happy to help! Limit: 1 promotional item per login per achievement reached Promotion begins with all deals closed starting on 11/20/2017 Mass Solar Loan deals are not eligible for this promotion Promotion valid while supplies last.
So far 11 partners have cashed in their BlueWave Bonuses, you could be next!
Thank you for your work to make Solar for Everyone, Everywhere a reality.
We cannot wait to celebrate your achievements.
- All of us here at BlueWave (888) 817-2703 partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
